function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination and standardization in WBE pilot projects targeting Covid-19","Impact":"Inefficient use of resources and lack of leveraging worldwide knowledge and best practices","Mitigation":"Establish national and international direction, coordination, and government funding","Technologies":"WBE testing protocols, nationalized networks","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"World Health Organization, government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of unified worldwide plan for WBE development","Impact":"Duplicative efforts and inefficient resource usage","Mitigation":"Develop a unified worldwide plan with standardized, optimized, quality-assured WBE testing protocols","Technologies":"Standardization and inter-laboratory studies","People":"Public health officials, government authorities","Owner":"International organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Limited interest and involvement of politicians, military leaders, and government officials in WBE development","Impact":"Lack of support for WBE initiatives and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Attract interest and involvement of politicians, military leaders, and government officials through effective communication and advocacy","Technologies":"Advocacy strategies, communication tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Advocacy organizations, public health officials"}]}
